title: Stormi dressed up as Kylie Jenner for Halloween this year, and we’re dying
text:
We love a good celebrity mommy-and-me Halloween costume. This year, though, Kylie Jenner and her daughter Stormi just took it to another level. Stormi dressed up as her mother at the 2019 Met Gala, and it was straight-up adorable.

We all know that Jenner takes Halloween seriously. Just think back to her pitch-perfect “Dirrty”-era Christina Aguilera costume or even this year’s Madonna and Britney costume with BFF Stassie. And now it seems clear that Stormi Webster is following in her mom’s footsteps, in more ways than one.

Here’s Kylie Jenner with Kendall at the 2019 Met Gala, just for reference:

And here’s little Stormi channeling Kylie in her feather-filled, monochromatic purple look, right down to the lavender wig:

“My baby!!!!!!!! 💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜 i cant handle this!!!!” Jenner captioned the photo. Kylie, we feel you. We can’t handle the cuteness, either. And from the looks of Stomi’s face in the video, she’s loving it, too. It seems we have another Kardashian-Jenner who loves spooky season.

This isn’t the first time Kylie and daughter Stormi have gone for twinning looks for Halloween. (And, actually, not even close to the first time they’ve worn matchy-matchy outfits in everyday life, either.)

Last year, Kylie and Stormi had two twinning Halloween costumes.

The mom-and-daughter duo dressed as pink butterflies for look one.

And they found inspiration in Stormi’s name for costume number two.

Knowing the Kardashian-Jenner clan, this probably isn’t the last Halloween costume of the year for Kylie and Stormi, either. We have our eyes out for more cuteness as Hallo-week continues.
description: Stormi Webster loves twinning as much as her mom, it seems, because she dressed in a Kylie Jenner costume for Halloween. It was honestly too cute.
